description.p: This command show the configuration and status details of a link. This is useful for debugging purposes as well as for retrieving the current load of a link.

The output of this command is a list of name / value pairs, each on a separate line. The value is separated from the name by a colon (':'). The following example illustrates this format.
cbgp> net link 1.0.0.1 1.0.0.2 show info
iface : 1.0.0.2/32
type : rtr
dest : 1.0.0.2
capacity : 0
delay : 0
load : 3
igp-depth: 1
tos00 : 1
cbgp>

see-also.p: To change the load of a link, see command net node X record-routenet_node_record-route and command net traffic loadnet_traffic_load.
